trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> objects inside an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control.
This class cannot be inherited.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection> class represents a collection that enables an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control to maintain a list of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects it contains.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection.Add%2A> method to add a specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to the collection at the end of an ordinal index array.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection.Insert%2A> method to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to the collection at a specified index location.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection.Item%2A> indexer to directly access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object in the collection at a specified index, using simple array notation.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object from the end of the collection.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method to remove a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object from a specified index location.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection"></xref> class.
When overridden in a derived class, this constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection> class.
Appends a specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection"></xref> collection.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection.Add%2A> method adds the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to the end of the collection.
To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to the collection at a specific index location, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection.Insert%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object to append to the collection.
The index at which the object was added to the collection.
Inserts a specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection"></xref> collection at the specified index location.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection.Insert%2A> method adds the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to the collection at the specified index location.
To append a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to the end of the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection.Add%2A> method.
The array index at which to add the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object to add to the collection.
Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection"></xref> collection.
Use this indexer to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object in the collection at the specified index, using array notation.
The indexer allows you to modify or replace a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object in the collection directly.
The ordinal index value that specifies the location of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object in the collection.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection"></xref> collection.
Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection"></xref> collection.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection.Remove%2A> method removes the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object from the collection.
To remove a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object from the collection at a specified index location, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.

To add new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects to the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection.Add%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection.Insert%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object to remove from the collection.
Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object at the specified index location from the collection.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method removes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object at the specified index location from the collection.
To remove a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object from the collection by name, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection.Remove%2A> method.

To add new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects to the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection.Add%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection.Insert%2A> method.
The array index from which to remove the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object.
